name: Ace
summary: Meet Ace{BOT}. The intelligent task manager on Slack. Your personal slackbot that lets you manage your todos and daily actionnitems - without ever leaving Slack. Ace is your daily task manager on Slack that will work with you to get tasks done.
details: Meet Ace{BOT}. The intelligent task manager on Slack. Your personal slackbot that lets you manage your todos and daily actionnitems - without ever leaving Slack. Ace is your daily task manager on Slack that will work with you to get tasks done.

name: Akamai Technologies
summary: Bot Manager relies on the simple premise that not all bots are created equal. Many bots play a legitimate role in online business strategy. Others harm businesses by reducing competitive advantage, getting between an organization and its customers, or committing fraud. Bot Manager provides a flexible framework to manage the wide array of bots accessing websites every day.
details: Bot Manager relies on the simple premise that not all bots are created equal. Many bots play a legitimate role in online business strategy. Others harm businesses by reducing competitive advantage, getting between an organization and its customers, or committing fraud. Bot Manager provides a flexible framework to manage the wide array of bots accessing websites every day.

name: API.AI
summary: Api.ai provides developers and companies with the advanced tools they need to build voice interfaces for apps and hardware devices. The Api.ai platform lets developers seamlessly integrate intelligent voice command systems into their products to create consumer-friendly voice-enabled user interfaces. Api.ai is also the company behind Assistant, a first of its kind conversational assistant app crea
details: Api.ai provides developers and companies with the advanced tools they need to build voice interfaces for apps and hardware devices. The Api.ai platform lets developers seamlessly integrate intelligent voice command systems into their products to create consumer-friendly voice-enabled user interfaces. Api.ai is also the company behind Assistant, a first of its kind conversational assistant app created in 2010 that now has more than 20 million users and is the highest rated assistant app available. The Api.ai team and board of advisors brings decades of experience in artificial intelligence, machine learning and human-computer interaction services.

name: Beep Boop
summary: Beep Boop is a ridiculously simple hosting platform for your Slack bots. A hosting platform for Slack bots with turnkey build and deployments. Your Bots source code is managed through Github and launched as a container, so whatever language you prefer is A-OK.
details: Beep Boop is a ridiculously simple hosting platform for your Slack bots. A hosting platform for Slack bots with turnkey build and deployments. Your Bots source code is managed through Github and launched as a container, so whatever language you prefer is A-OK.

name: Bigbux
summary: Bigbux is a bot that will quickly pay contractors and freelancers via Stripe.
details: Bigbux is a bot that will quickly pay contractors and freelancers via Stripe.

name: Birdly
summary: Birdly tackles the trivia of expense reports and helps professionals focus on what matters most. Birdly is the first Slack bot that makes the expense reporting experience completely seamless. We extract information from receipts and use data intelligence to determine the relevant client, project, or travel context of the expense.

details: Chatfuel helps easily create chatbots to engage with your audience on messengers. Powering a new kind of conversation. No programming required. Create chatbots easily u2014 no coding required. Reliable, free hosting provides a secure experience for your users. And weu2019ll make sure your code is always up-to-date, automatically. Engage and retain users. Send news, collect feedback, receive and answer questions and share content libraries u2014 from GIFs to full business docs. Just plug in your data streams. Chatfuel has hundreds of integrations available u2014 YouTube, Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, and more.

name: Clubble
summary: Clubble.io bridges the gap between your Slack team and your email-reliant clients or partners. This integration allows you to receive emails & attachments in your channels andu2014most importantlyu2014to reply directly from Slack. Two different tools, one same conversation.

name: Confetti
summary: A very serious news service. Slack and Confetti make a great pair. Add to your channel and get updates there. Usually itu2019s news and mostly smart stuff. Sometimes itu2019s random but funny enough.
details: A very serious news service. Slack and Confetti make a great pair. Add to your channel and get updates there. Usually itu2019s news and mostly smart stuff. Sometimes itu2019s random but funny enough.

name: Converse
summary: Automated social media handling using bots. Unlike existing messaging platforms, Converse is focussed around enabling end user to service conversations. These may be to a computer/bot, a human, or a combination of both.
details: Automated social media handling using bots. Unlike existing messaging platforms, Converse is focussed around enabling end user to service conversations. These may be to a computer/bot, a human, or a combination of both.

name: DBot
summary: DBOT monitors Slack conversations for URL, File and IP addresses and alerts users on malicious content before harm is done. DBOT was designed for Securing Slack Content for anybody using Slack and enabling easy access to advanced security information for security professionals using Slack.
details: DBOT monitors Slack conversations for URL, File and IP addresses and alerts users on malicious content before harm is done. name: Growbot
summary: Share, celebrate, and save team accomplishments in Slack!  Do you remember your top accomplishments last year? Growbot does. Growbot is the first Slackbot to help recognize and record your teams wins. We all want to know were doing meaningful work. Growbot helps you track it.

name: Nestor
summary: Supercharge your team with Bot Powers in Seconds. Nestor has a large and growing library of bot powers from your favorite services. Want to integrate with a private API that belongs to your company? No problem, start coding your power in the Nestor Bot Development Environment with a very Simple Javascript API and deploy your bot power in seconds.

name: Nikabot
summary: Hands-free team tracking for Slack.  Let Nikabot track down your team and bring you reports, you dont have to do a thing. See what your whole team has been working on, all in one neatly organized place. Detailed views for project managers and billing, a clear view of how things are going.

summary: Get notified on Slack or HipChat, when your company is mentioned on the web.

name: ottspott
summary: Ottspott makes communication between your team and your clients easier. You dont need to own a phone set to have a local number anymore. With a simple Slack integration, Ottspott lets you make and receive calls through your browser. Its even better with a team - you can forward your calls to other members in your team and let them deal with it.

name: Pandorabots
summary: Pandorabots is a web service for building and deploying chatbots. The Pandorabots Playground is a free, integrated development environment for building chatbots loaded with features and tools. Learn the basics of chatbot development in minutes, or hone your skills with our Tutorial.

name: Partyline
summary: Project Management through Slack. Turn your Slack Conversations into project tickets.  Our custom slash command lets you use the power of Sprintly right from within Slack. Create new tickets or update, delete and search existing ones. Just type /partyline to get started.
details: Project Management through Slack. Turn your Slack Conversations into project tickets.  Our custom slash command lets you use the power of Sprintly right from within Slack. Create new tickets or update, delete and search existing ones. Just type /partyline to get started.

summary: Stream actionable user activity from your app to Slack. Relay lets you easily pick events from your app and stream them to Slack.

name: Revealytics
summary: Revealytics helps you understand what u200bis going on with u200byour marketing, product and revenue metrics by connecting user acquisition and revenue data. name: Roundtable
summary: When team members are aware of each other, productivity soars. Say goodbye to old-school reporting: with daily one-sentence updates, the whole team knows whats going on and who needs help. Publish daily one-sentence status in one click. Now your colleagues are aware of your load, successes and roadblocks. Say goodbye to old-school reporting.

name: Simple Poll
summary: Simple Pollu2122 is the easiest way to create polls in Slack. Its quick, and more importantly its native. Everything happens right within Slack. We do not store your poll data anywhere and you do not have to go to our website to see the results.

name: Telegram
summary: Telegram is about freedom and openness u2013 our code is open for everyone, as is our API. Today weu2019re making another step towards openness by launching a Bot API and platform for third-party developers to create bots. Bots are simply Telegram accounts operated by software u2013 not people u2013 and theyll often have AI features. They can do anything u2013 teach, play, search, broadcast, remin
details: Telegram is about freedom and openness u2013 our code is open for everyone, as is our API. Today weu2019re making another step towards openness by launching a Bot API and platform for third-party developers to create bots. Bots are simply Telegram accounts operated by software u2013 not people u2013 and theyll often have AI features. They can do anything u2013 teach, play, search, broadcast, remind, connect, integrate with other services, or even pass commands to the Internet of Things.

name: Twitch Bot Directory
summary: twitchbots.info is a service that tries to collect all moderator and other serivce bots used in chats on Twitch. It is ran independently and developed as a hobby project.

name: WealthBot
summary: Wealthbot.io is an open source wealth management platform that reduces the cost barriers for Investment Advisors (RIAs) associated with serving the mass affluent. The technology for your investment advisor business. Wealthbot is a portfolio management platform thats extensible, customizable and 100% owned by you.
details: Wealthbot.io is an open source wealth management platform that reduces the cost barriers for Investment Advisors (RIAs) associated with serving the mass affluent. name: Workbot
summary: Workbot, the first chat bot on the market that enables employees to access and command applications from within chat. When it comes to interactions with business apps, Workbot shifts Slack from a listening and communication platform to a doing platform as it takes commands and executes actionsu2013it even understands the chat context and makes recommendations.
